name: 鄭國忠
objective: 本課程之內容包括:化學動力學及反應機構之基本理論,動力學數據之處理,各式理想反應器之設計。
schedule:
Week 1:
Introduction
Weeks 2 and 3:
Chapter 1- Mole Balances
Weeks 4 and 5:
Chapter 2- Conversion and Reactor Sizing
Weeks 6 and 7:
Chapter 3- Rate Law and Stoichiometry
Week 8:
Mid-exam
Weeks 9 and 10:
Chapter 4-Isothermal Reactor Design
Weeks 11 and 12:
Chapter 5-Collection and Analysis of Rate Data
Weeks 13 and 14:
Chapter 6-Multiple Reactions
Week 15, 16:
Chapter 7-: Reaction Mechanisms, Pathways, Bioreactions and Bioreactors 
Week 17:
Chapter 10- Catalysis and Catalytic Reactors
Week 18:
Final-exam
scorePolicy:
Mid-exam: 30
Final-exam: 40
Class Attendance and Homework: 30-
Max.:100
materials: H. Scott Fogler, Elements of Chemical Reaction Engineering 4th Ed
